messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Need help on finding the balance - Re Robin

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/13/02 1:09:46 PM Eastern Standard Time,
diamondair@... writes:

> Assuming you're talking about me (there are several Robins on the
> list, I think), Thanks. :-)
>

Yeah, it was you.. and I just read your last post.. and I love you even
more.. :-) I can see why you are writing a novel, you do a good job of
putting ideas and thoughts into perspective.

Teresa

messages.subject: Re: Need help on finding the balance - Re Robin
messages.msgSnippet: ... Assuming you re talking about me (there are several Robins on the list, I think), Thanks. :-) ... we are ... for being ... Hmmm, never been accused of
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, grlynbl@a... wrote:
> I LOVE YOU ROBIN! .. And to think, we've never even met. .lol :-)

Assuming you're talking about me (there are several Robins on the
list, I think), Thanks. :-)

>
> You said so aptly what I have struggled to say. Sometimes when
we are
> running on emotion, its difficult to express our thoughts. Thanks
for being
> so consise with your point.

Hmmm, never been accused of being "concise" in my life :-), but I'm
always glad if something I've got to say is useful to anyone. I don't
get to visit this list very often, as it is just way too much to even
*read* all the posts that come through in a day. But I can't resist
occasionally popping in here and there.

Blue Skies,

-Robin-

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Need help on finding the balance - Re Robin
messages.msgSnippet: I LOVE YOU ROBIN! .. And to think, we ve never even met. .lol :-) You said so aptly what I have struggled to say.   Sometimes when we are running on emotion,
messages.messageBody:
I LOVE YOU ROBIN! .. And to think, we've never even met. .lol :-)

You said so aptly what I have struggled to say. Sometimes when we are
running on emotion, its difficult to express our thoughts. Thanks for being
so consise with your point.

Teresa
